mapper.insert:
insert into sys_role
sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, code, name, level, att2, att3, att4, att5, att6, date_att1, date_att2, num_att1, num_att2, num_att3, num_att4, remark,
#{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateAtt1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateAtt2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{numAtt1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAtt2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAtt3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{numAtt4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT sr.id, sr.sys_code, sr.creator, sr.gmt_create, sr.modifier, sr.gmt_modified, sr.is_deleted, sr. CODE, sr. NAME, sr. LEVEL, sr.att2, sr.att3, sr.att4, sr.att5, sr.att6, sr.date_att1, sr.date_att2, sr.num_att1, sr.num_att2, sr.num_att3, sr.num_att4, sr.remark FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON (sur.role_id = sr.id) WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select r.id from sys_role r where r.code = 'U3d_default'
SELECT id AS id FROM sys_role WHERE code= #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
